00014 #ifndef ULIB_UXML2NODE_H
00015 #define ULIB_UXML2NODE_H 1

00017 #include <ulib/container/vector.h>

00019 #include <libxml/tree.h>
00020 #include <libxml/xpathInternals.h>
00021 
00022 /*
00023 Represents XML Nodes.
00024 You should never new or delete Nodes. The Parser will create and manage them for you.
00025 
00026 struct _xmlNode {
00027         void*                                   _private;       // application data
00028         xmlElementType          type;                   // type number, must be second !
00029         const xmlChar*          name;                   // the name of the node, or the entity
00030         struct _xmlNode*        children;   // parent->childs link
00031         struct _xmlNode*        last;                   // last child link
00032         struct _xmlNode*        parent;         // child->parent link
00033         struct _xmlNode*        next;                   // next sibling link
00034         struct _xmlNode*        prev;                   // previous sibling link
00035         struct _xmlDoc* doc;                    // the containing document
00036         // End of common part
00037         xmlNs*                          ns;                     // pointer to the associated namespace
00038         xmlChar*                                content;                // the content
00039         struct _xmlAttr*        properties;     // properties list
00040         xmlNs*                          nsDef;          // namespace definitions on this node
00041         void*                                   psvi;                   // for type/PSVI informations
00042         unsigned short          line;                   // line number
00043         unsigned short          extra;          // extra data for XPath/XSLT
00044 };
00045 */
00046 
00047 class U_EXPORT UXML2Node {
00048 public:
00049 
00050         // Check for memory error
00051         U_MEMORY_TEST
00052 
00053         // Allocator e Deallocator
00054         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00055         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00056 
00057         // Costruttori
00058 
00059         UXML2Node(xmlNodePtr node) : impl_(node)
00060                 {
00061                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UXML2Node, "%p", node)
00062                 }
00063 
00064         ~UXML2Node()
00065                 {
00066                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UXML2Node)
00067                 }
00068 
00074         const char* getName() const
00075                 {
00076                 U_TRACE(0, "UXML2Node::getName()")
00077 
00078                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00079 
00080                 const char* result = (impl_->name ? (const char*)impl_->name : "");
00081 
00082                 U_RETURN(result);
00083                 }
00084 
00090         void setName(const xmlChar* name)
00091                 {
00092                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Node::setName(%S)", name)
00093 
00094                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00095 
00096                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(xmlNodeSetName, "%p,%S", impl_, name);
00097                 }
00098 
00099         // Look for existing namespace to use
00100 
00101         xmlNsPtr getNamespace(const xmlChar* ns_prefix)
00102                 {
00103                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Node::getNamespace(%S)", ns_prefix)
00104 
00105                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00106                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_->doc)
00107 
00108                 // Look for the existing namespace to use
00109 
00110                 xmlNsPtr ns = (xmlNsPtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlSearchNs, "%p,%p,%S", impl_->doc, impl_, ns_prefix);
00111 
00112                 U_RETURN_POINTER(ns,xmlNs);
00113                 }
00114 
00115         void setNameSpace(xmlNsPtr ns)
00116                 {
00117                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Node::setNameSpace(%p)", ns)
00118 
00119                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00120 
00121                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(xmlSetNs, "%p,%S", impl_, ns); // Use it for this element
00122                 }
00123 
00131         bool setNameSpace(const xmlChar* ns_prefix = 0)
00132                 {
00133                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Node::setNameSpace(%S)", ns_prefix)
00134 
00135                 xmlNsPtr ns = getNamespace(ns_prefix);
00136 
00137                 if (ns)
00138                         {
00139                         setNameSpace(ns);
00140 
00141                         U_RETURN(true);
00142                         }
00143 
00144                 U_RETURN(false);
00145                 }
00146 
00153         void setNameSpaceDeclaration(const char* ns_uri, const char* ns_prefix = 0)
00154                 {
00155                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Node::setNameSpaceDeclaration(%S,%S)", ns_uri, ns_prefix)
00156 
00157                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00158 
00159                 xmlNsPtr ns = (xmlNsPtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlNewNs, "%p,%S,%S", impl_, (const xmlChar*)ns_uri, (const xmlChar*)ns_prefix);
00160 
00161                 setNameSpace(ns);
00162                 }
00163 
00164         const char* getNameSpacePrefix() const
00165                 {
00166                 U_TRACE(0, "UXML2Node::getNameSpacePrefix()")
00167 
00168                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00169 
00170                 // check for impl_ if is actually of type xmlDoc, instead of just xmlNode.
00171                 // This can be an issue when calling this method on a UXML2Node returned by find().
00172                 // Therefore, a call to impl_->ns would be invalid.
00173 
00174                 const char* result = (impl_->type != XML_DOCUMENT_NODE && impl_->ns && impl_->ns->prefix ? (const char*)impl_->ns->prefix : "");
00175 
00176                 U_RETURN(result);
00177                 }
00178 
00179         const xmlChar* getNameSpaceUri();
00180 
00190         bool checkNodeName(const xmlChar* name, const xmlChar* ns)
00191                 {
00192                 U_TRACE(0, "UXML2Node::checkNodeName(%S,%S)", name, ns)
00193 
00194                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00195 
00196                 bool result = (xmlStrEqual(impl_->name, name) && xmlStrEqual(getNameSpaceUri(), ns));
00197 
00198                 U_RETURN(result);
00199                 }
00200 
00206         int getLine() const { return XML_GET_LINE(impl_); }
00207 
00213         xmlNodePtr getParent() const { return (impl_->parent && impl_->parent->type == XML_ELEMENT_NODE ? impl_->parent : 0); }
00214 
00220         static xmlNodePtr getNextSibling(xmlNodePtr node)
00221                 {
00222                 U_TRACE(0, "UXML2Node::getNextSibling(%p)", node)
00223 
00224                 while (node && (node->type != XML_ELEMENT_NODE)) node = node->next;
00225 
00226                 U_RETURN_POINTER(node, xmlNode);
00227                 }
00228 
00229         xmlNodePtr getNextSibling() const { return getNextSibling(impl_->next); }
00230 
00236         xmlNodePtr getPreviousSibling() const { return impl_->prev; }
00237 
00244         uint32_t getChildren(UVector<xmlNodePtr>& children, const xmlChar* name) const;
00245 
00254         xmlNodePtr addChild(const xmlChar* name, const xmlChar* ns_prefix = 0)
00255                 {
00256                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Node::addChild(%S,%S)", name, ns_prefix)
00257 
00258                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00259 
00260                 xmlNodePtr node  = 0;
00261                 xmlNodePtr child = createNewChildNode(name, ns_prefix);
00262 
00263                 if (child) node = (xmlNodePtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlAddChild, "%p,%p", impl_, child);
00264 
00265                 U_RETURN_POINTER(node,_xmlNode);
00266                 }
00267 
00277         xmlNodePtr addChild(xmlNodePtr previous_sibling, const xmlChar* name, const xmlChar* ns_prefix = 0)
00278                 {
00279                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Node::addChild(%p,%S,%S)", previous_sibling, name, ns_prefix)
00280 
00281                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(previous_sibling)
00282 
00283                 xmlNodePtr node  = 0;
00284                 xmlNodePtr child = createNewChildNode(name, ns_prefix);
00285 
00286                 if (child) node = (xmlNodePtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlAddNextSibling, "%p,%p", previous_sibling, child);
00287 
00288                 U_RETURN_POINTER(node,_xmlNode);
00289                 }
00290 
00300         xmlNodePtr addChildBefore(xmlNodePtr next_sibling, const xmlChar* name, const xmlChar* ns_prefix = 0)
00301                 {
00302                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Node::addChildBefore(%p,%S,%S)", next_sibling, name, ns_prefix)
00303 
00304                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(next_sibling)
00305 
00306                 xmlNodePtr node  = 0;
00307                 xmlNodePtr child = createNewChildNode(name, ns_prefix);
00308 
00309                 if (child) node = (xmlNodePtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlAddPrevSibling, "%p,%p", next_sibling, child);
00310 
00311                 U_RETURN_POINTER(node,_xmlNode);
00312                 }
00313 
00319         static void removeChild(xmlNodePtr node)
00320                 {
00321                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Node::removeChild(%p)", node)
00322 
00323                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(xmlUnlinkNode, "%p", node);
00324                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(xmlFreeNode,     "%p", node);
00325                 }
00326 
00330         static const char* getProp(xmlNodePtr node, const char* name)
00331                 {
00332                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Node::getProp(%p,%S)", node, name)
00333 
00334                 const char* prop = (const char*) U_SYSCALL(xmlGetProp, "%p,%S", node, (const xmlChar*)name);
00335 
00336                 U_RETURN(prop);
00337                 }
00338 
00342         static xmlChar* getContent(xmlNodePtr node)
00343                 {
00344                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Node::getContent(%p)", node)
00345 
00346                 xmlChar* content = (xmlChar*) U_SYSCALL(xmlNodeGetContent, "%p", node);
00347 
00348                 U_RETURN_POINTER(content, xmlChar);
00349                 }
00350 
00359         xmlNodePtr importNode(const xmlNodePtr node, bool recursive = true);
00360 
00366         const char* getPath() const
00367                 {
00368                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Node::getPath()")
00369 
00370                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00371 
00372                 const char* path = (const char*) U_SYSCALL(xmlGetNodePath, "%p", impl_);
00373 
00374                 U_RETURN(path);
00375                 }
00376 
00382         uint32_t find(UVector<xmlNodePtr>& vec, const xmlChar* xpath) const
00383                 {
00384                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Node::find(%p,%S)", &vec, xpath)
00385 
00386                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00387                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_->doc)
00388 
00389                 xmlXPathContextPtr ctxt = (xmlXPathContextPtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlXPathNewContext, "%p", impl_->doc);
00390 
00391                 ctxt->node = impl_;
00392 
00393                 return find_impl(vec, ctxt, xpath);
00394                 }
00395 
00402         uint32_t find(UVector<xmlNodePtr>& vec, const xmlChar* xpath, UVector<UString>& namespaces) const;
00403 
00404         // Access the underlying libxml2 implementation.
00405 
00406         xmlNodePtr cobj() { return      impl_; }
00407 
00408 #ifdef DEBUG
00409         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00410 #endif
00411 
00412 protected:
00413         xmlNodePtr impl_;
00414 
00415         static uint32_t find_impl(UVector<xmlNodePtr>& vec, xmlXPathContext* ctxt, const xmlChar* xpath);
00416 
00417         // Create the C instance ready to be added to the parent node.
00418 
00419         xmlNodePtr createNewChildNode(const xmlChar* name, const xmlChar* ns_prefix = 0);
00420 
00421 private:
00422    UXML2Node(const UXML2Node&)            {}
00423    UXML2Node& operator=(const UXML2Node&) { return *this; }
00424 };
